sentences: Lind kavatseb oma pesa puu otsa ehitama.
Perekond kavatseb endale uue elukoha leida.
Huntide pesapaigas on alati toitu ja varju.
context: The word 'kavatseb' is the 3rd person singular present tense form of the Estonian verb 'kavatseda', which means 'to plan' or 'to intend'. It indicates that someone has a deliberate intention to do something in the present time. This verb is commonly used when discussing future actions that are being planned or intended by a subject.
